display_long_description:
Chrono has shattered the timeline, and only you can fix it.
Step into the world of Chrono Hunter, a VR action roguelite where fractured time threatens the very fabric of reality. As an elite agent of the STU (Space-time Unit), it's up to you to restore balance to the universe.
[media]
Armed with experimental gear, reality-bending abilities, and your own instincts, you’ll journey across worlds that collide past, present, and future into one chaotic battlefield.
[media]
Each run reshuffles the rules of reality. Every playthrough offers new enemy formations, randomized events, and hidden secrets to uncover.
[media]
Face relentless waves of enemies who strike from all sides. To survive, you’ll need to adapt quickly, dodging, switching weapons, and timing your skills with precision.
[media]
Combine the impossible. Modern rifles, arcane spellblades, experimental tech, each weapon is designed to feel distinct in VR, rewarding creativity and quick reflexes.
[media]
Harness powers that bend the flow of battle, slowing enemies, speeding your strikes, or unleashing chaos that shifts the entire fight. 
[media]
At the end of each world stands a powerful guardian of time. Defeating them isn’t just survival, it’s one step closer to repairing reality itself.
[media]
Between runs, unlock new skills, weapon upgrades, and STU enhancements.
[media]
Time is broken. Chaos reigns. The hunt begins.
